title: Ice Gift
description: An illustrated short story (every page is a big full-colour picture) about a cold postapocalyptic world where wandering ice brings ancient things to the shores on which the last humans live. Two kids find a man frozen in the ice. The man wakes up...This is the story the sci-fi comic known as "Gifts of Wandering Ice" is based upon.
author: Olga  Makarova
